DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":30,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MoreDays2ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MoreDays2Done
from Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 3, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))
and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Configuration: {"stateStoring":{"enabled":false},"width":"120","height":"83","searchPanel":{"visible":false},"columnChooser":{"enabled":false},"onToolbarPreparing":"null","export":{"enabled":false},"groupPanel":{"visible":false},"grouping":{"autoExpandAll":false},"selection":{"mode":"single"},"sorting":{"mode":"none"},"allowColumnReordering":"true","rowAlternationEnabled":"true","showBorders":false,"columns":[{"headerCellTemplate":"function (element, info) {            var today = new Date();            today.setDate(today.getDate()+3);            var date = today.toLocaleDateString(undefined,{day:'2-digit'}) + ' ' + today.toLocaleDateString(undefined,{month:'short'});            var final = SW.setAttribute(element, date, 'style', 'background-color: #0072C6; color: white; border-radius: 4px; line-height: 33px; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700');            element.append(final);        }","alignment":"center","cellTemplate":"function(e, i) {             var toDo = i.data['MoreDays2ToDo'];            var done = i.data['MoreDays2Done'];            var aux = done + ' / ' + toDo;            SW.setAttribute(e, aux, 'style', 'font-size: 15px; font-weight: 700')        }"}]}

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":30,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select count(dj.[ClientId]) as CountLate
from Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) < Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) and (dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5)
		and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Configuration: {"stateStoring":{"enabled":false},"searchPanel":{"visible":false},"width":"120","height":"83","columnChooser":{"enabled":false},"onToolbarPreparing":"null","export":{"enabled":false},"groupPanel":{"visible":false},"grouping":{"autoExpandAll":false},"selection":{"mode":"single"},"sorting":{"mode":"none"},"allowColumnReordering":false,"rowAlternationEnabled":"true","showBorders":false,"columns":[{"caption":"Delayed","headerCellTemplate":"function(e, i) { SW.setAttribute(e, i.column.caption, 'style', 'background-color: rgb(247, 65, 45); color: white; border-radius: 4px; line-height: 33px; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700'); }","alignment":"center","dataField":"CountLate","cellTemplate":"function(e, i) { SW.setAttribute(e, i.data.CountLate, 'style', 'font-size: 15px; font-weight: 700') }"}]}

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":110,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select v.Client, v.ClientId, v.Day, cc.HasImage, sum(v.Done) as Done, sum(v.ToDo) as ToDo
from (
select	dj.[Client], dj.[ClientId],
		case 
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) < Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 0
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 1
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 2
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 3
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 3, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 4
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 4, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 5
		end as Day,
		sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)) as ToDo,
		sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)) as Done
from	Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
group by dj.[Client], dj.[Date], dj.[ClientId]
) as v
left join [CommercialClient] cc
on cc.Oid = v.ClientId
group by v.Client, v.ClientId, v.Day, cc.HasImage","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":230,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select v.[User], v.UserId, v.Day, u.HasImage, sum(v.Done) as Done, sum(v.ToDo) as ToDo
from (
select	dj.[User], dj.[UserId],
		case 
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) < Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 0
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) then 1
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 2
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 3
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 3, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 4
			when Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 4, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) then 5
		end as Day,
		sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)) as ToDo,
		sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)) as Done
from	Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
group by dj.[User], dj.[Date], dj.[UserId]
) as v
left join [User] u
on u.Oid = v.UserId
group by v.[User], v.[UserId], v.Day, u.HasImage","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":30,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MoreDays3ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MoreDays3Done
from Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 4, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))
and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Configuration: {"stateStoring":{"enabled":false},"width":"120","height":"83","searchPanel":{"visible":false},"columnChooser":{"enabled":false},"onToolbarPreparing":"null","export":{"enabled":false},"groupPanel":{"visible":false},"grouping":{"autoExpandAll":false},"selection":{"mode":"single"},"sorting":{"mode":"none"},"allowColumnReordering":"true","rowAlternationEnabled":"true","showBorders":false,"columns":[{"headerCellTemplate":"function (element, info) {                var today = new Date();                today.setDate(today.getDate()+4);                var date = today.toLocaleDateString(undefined,{day:'2-digit'}) + ' ' + today.toLocaleDateString(undefined,{month:'short'});                var final = SW.setAttribute(element, date, 'style', 'background-color: #0072C6; color: white; border-radius: 4px; line-height: 33px; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700');                element.append(final);            }","alignment":"center","cellTemplate":"function(e, i) {                 var toDo = i.data['MoreDays3ToDo'];                var done = i.data['MoreDays3Done'];                var aux = done + ' / ' + toDo;                SW.setAttribute(e, aux, 'style', 'font-size: 15px; font-weight: 700')            }"}]}

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Media","WidgetType":"chart","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":30,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-5, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-5, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-5, 0)
and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-4, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-4, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-4, 0)
and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-3, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-3, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-3, 0)
and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-2, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-2, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-2, 0)
and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-1, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-1, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7-1, 0)
and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 0)
and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+1, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+1, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+1, 0)
and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+2, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+2, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+2, 0)
and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+3, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+3, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+3, 0)
and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+4, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+4, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+4, 0)
and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
union all
select DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+5, 0) as Week,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as Done
from Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+5, 5) and dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7+5, 0)
and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":30,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MoreDays1ToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as MoreDays1Done
from Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 2, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))
and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":30,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as TomorrowToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as TomorrowDone
from Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))
and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Configuration: {"stateStoring":{"enabled":false},"width":"120","height":"83","searchPanel":{"visible":false},"columnChooser":{"enabled":false},"onToolbarPreparing":"null","export":{"enabled":false},"groupPanel":{"visible":false},"grouping":{"autoExpandAll":false},"selection":{"mode":"single"},"scrolling1":{"mode":"virtual","rowRenderingMode":"virtual"},"sorting":{"mode":"none"},"allowColumnReordering":"true","rowAlternationEnabled":"true","showBorders":false,"columns":[{"caption":"Tomorrow","headerCellTemplate":"function(e, i) { SW.setAttribute(e, i.column.caption, 'style', 'background-color: rgb(126, 200, 128); color: white; border-radius: 4px; line-height: 33px; font-size: 18px; font-weight: 700'); }","alignment":"center","cellTemplate":"function(e, i) {                 var toDo = i.data['TomorrowToDo'];                var done = i.data['TomorrowDone'];                var aux = done + ' / ' + toDo;                SW.setAttribute(e, aux, 'style', 'font-size: 15px; font-weight: 700')    }"}]}

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Pending Jobs
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":400,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select 	dj.[UserId], 
		dj.[User], 
		u.[HasImage] UserHasImage,
		dj.Name,
		dj.[Project], 
		convert(Date, dj.[Date]) as Date,
		cc.Name as Client,
		cc.HasImage as ClientHasImage,
		cc.Oid as ClientId
from [CommercialClient] cc, Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
left join [User] u
on u.[Oid] = dj.[UserId]
where 	cc.Oid = dj.ClientId and
		(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5) and
		dj.[Date] < DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 5) and 
		dj.[Date] > DATEADD(week, DATEDIFF(day, 0, getdate())/7, 0)
		and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
order by dj.[Date]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]

[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetHeight":30,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] = 4 or dj.[StateTypeCode] = 5, 1, 0)), 0) as TodayToDo,
		IsNull(sum(iif(dj.[StateTypeCode] > 5, 1, 0)), 0) as TodayDone
from Analytics.Job(@CurrentUserId) dj
where Convert(Date, dj.[Date]) = Convert(Date, DATEADD(day, 0, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP))
and (dj.[CompanyId]  = @Company or @Company = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DivisionId] = @Division or @Division = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
		(dj.[DepartmentId] = @Department or @Department = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":["Company","Division","Department"]}}]
